Name: CM PRESS DUMP 4.5.4.11
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.4.11 CM Pressure Dump</size>

	Note: The following needs to be off or isolated to prevent 	
			unnecessary O2 usage:
Panel 2		EMER CAB PRESS sel 				- OFF
			PRESSURE SUIT CIRCUIT 				- isolated from cabin

	a.	Using Cab Press Relf Vlv
Panel 2		CAB FAN (both) 						- OFF (verify)
Panel 7		DIRECT O2 vlv 						- close (CW)
Panel 325	rh CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) 			- DUMP
			  (safety latch off)
Panel 2			CAB PRESS ind 					- 3.0-3.25 psia
Panel 325	rh CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) 			- BOOST/ENTR
Panel 2			O2 FLOW ind 					- ≈0.24 lb/hr
				SUIT PRESS ind 					- 3.5-4.0 psia
Panel 325	rh CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) 			- DUMP
Panel 2			CAB PRESS ind 					- 0.0 psia
				(within 6 min)
Panel 325	CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) 			- NORM
			  (safety latch on)

	b.	Using Side Hatch Cab Press Dump Vlv
Panel 2		CAB FAN (both) 						- OFF (verify)
Panel 351	EMER CAB PRESS sel 				- OFF
Panel 326	REPRESS PKG vlv 					- OFF
			
			If lone crewman oper
				REPRESS PKG vlv 				- FILL
Panel 601	REPRESS O2 vlv 					- CLOSE
Panel 7		DIRECT O2 vlv 						- close (CW) (verify)
Side hatch	CAB PRESS DUMP vlv 				- open (CCW - one turn)
Panel 2			CAB PRESS ind 					- 3.0-3.25 psia
Side hatch	CAB PRESS DUMP vlv 				- close (CW)
Panel 2			O2 FLOW ind 					- <0.5 lb/hr
				SUIT PRESS ind 					- 3.5-4.0 psia
Side hatch	CAB PRESS DUMP vlv 				- open (CCW)
Panel 2			CAB PRESS ind 					- ≈0 psia
Side hatch	CAB PRESS DUMP vlv 				- close (CW)

Steps.Text: Wait for CABIN PRESS to reach 3.25
